name.jp: 鍛冶屋の心得・ソケット作成編

description.en: This scroll protects armor suits from breaking when a piercing fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Piercing Menu before attempting the piercing. The scroll is consumed during the piercing process.
description.ar: This scroll protects armor suits from breaking when a piercing fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Piercing Menu before attempting the piercing. The scroll is consumed during the piercing process.
description.br: Evita que trajes de armaduras sejam destruídas caso a perfuração falhe. Para usar, coloque o pergaminho na caixa apropriada no menu de Perfuração antes de iniciar a tentativa de aprimoramento. O pergaminho é consumido no processo.
description.cns: 这个卷轴保护盔甲防具在穿洞失败时不被损坏。若要使用，请在尝试穿洞之前，在穿洞菜单上的相应框中放置卷轴。卷轴在穿洞过程中会被消耗掉。
description.de: Diese Schriftrolle schützt Rüstungen vor dem Kaputtgehen, wenn ein Piercing fehlschlägt. Um sie zu benutzen, muss die Schriftrolle in das entsprechende Feld im Menü " Piercing" gelegt werden, bevor das Piercing versucht wird. Die Schriftrolle wird während des Piercens verbraucht.
description.fi: This scroll protects armor suits from breaking when a piercing fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Piercing Menu before attempting the piercing. The scroll is consumed during the piercing process.
description.fil: This scroll protects armor suits from breaking when a piercing fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Piercing Menu before attempting the piercing. The scroll is consumed during the piercing process.
description.fr: Parchemin protégeant une armure de la destruction lors d'un piercing (efficace à 100%, mais chaque parchemin n'est actif que pour une seule tentative de piercing).
description.id: ulungan ini melindungi baju zirah agar tidak pecah saat penindikan gagal. Untuk menggunakannya, tempatkan gulir di kotak yang sesuai pada Menu Tindik sebelum mencoba penindikan. Gulungan dikonsumsi selama proses penindikan.
description.it: This scroll protects armor suits from breaking when a piercing fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Piercing Menu before attempting the piercing. The scroll is consumed during the piercing process.
description.jp: ソケット作成に失敗してもアイテムの消失を1回だけ防止してくれる。ソケット作成ウインドウの「補助アイテム」欄に入れて使用。成功失敗に関わらず消滅（通称: GProtect）
description.kr: 슈트 피어싱 도중 실패시 아이템 소실을 방지합니다. 사용하려면 피어싱하기 전에 스크롤을 피어싱 메뉴의 상자에 넣고 사용하십시오. 스크롤은 피어싱 과정에서 소모됩니다.
description.nl: This scroll protects armor suits from breaking when a piercing fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Piercing Menu before attempting the piercing. The scroll is consumed during the piercing process.
description.pl: This scroll protects armor suits from breaking when a piercing fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Piercing Menu before attempting the piercing. The scroll is consumed during the piercing process.
description.ru: Одноразовый. Предотвращает поломку костюма, оружия или щита при неудачной попытке просверлить гнездо. Для использования необходимо вложить свиток в соответствующую ячейку окна сверления.
description.sp: Este pergamino protege las armaduras para que no se rompan cuando falla un piercing. Para usarlo, coloca el pergamino en la casilla correspondiente del Menú de Piercing antes de intentar la mejora. El pergamino se consume en el proceso.
description.sw: This scroll protects armor suits from breaking when a piercing fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Piercing Menu before attempting the piercing. The scroll is consumed during the piercing process.
description.th: คัมภีร์นี้ปกป้องชุดเกราะจากการแตกหักเมื่อการเจาะล้มเหลว หากต้องการใช้ ให้วางคัมภีร์ใส่ลงในช่องที่เหมาะสมบนเมนูเจาะก่อนทำการเจาะ
description.tw: 精鍊前需先使用卷軸，打洞精鍊失敗時，物品不會消失。使用時請在打動之前將卷軸放在打洞選單上相對應框中。卷軸在打洞過程中會被消耗。
description.vi: Cuộn giấy này bảo vệ bộ áo giáp khỏi bị gãy khi xuyên thủng. Để sử dụng, hãy đặt cuộn vào ô thích hợp trên Menu Xuyên trước khi thử xỏ. Cuộn giấy được tiêu thụ trong quá trình xuyên qua.
